scripts.lint: npm --prefix product-service run lint && npm --prefix log-service run lint && npm --prefix api-gateway run lint
scripts.test: npm --prefix product-service run test && npm --prefix log-service run test && npm --prefix api-gateway run test
scripts.test:e2e: npm --prefix product-service run test:e2e && npm --prefix log-service run test:e2e && npm --prefix api-gateway run test:e2e
